reset.bodyDescription: Reset password, so you can manage the web
reset.checkPasswordChar:
Wrong password, accepted characters:

a-z A-Z 0-9 @ * # _-
reset.checkPasswordUpperCase: Incorrect password, at least one capital letter
reset.checkPasswordLowerCase: Incorrect password, at least one lowercase letter
reset.checkPasswordNumber: Incorrect password, at least one number
reset.checkPasswordSpecial:
Incorrect password, minimum one special character:

* # @ _-
reset.checkRepeatPasswordChar:
Repeat wrong password, characters accepted:

a-z A-Z 0-9 @ * # _-
reset.checkRepeatPasswordUpperCase: Repeat wrong password, at least one capital letter
reset.checkRepeatPasswordLowerCase: Repeat wrong password, at least one lowercase letter
reset.checkRepeatPasswordNumber: Repeat wrong password, minimum one number
reset.checkRepeatPasswordSpecial:
Repeat wrong password, minimum one special character:

* # @ _-
reset.checkRepeatPasswordCompare: Password and repeat password do not match
reset.checkPasswordPrevious: Password should not be equal to the previous
reset.mailContent:
Hello %s, the account was recovered successfully.

Panel link:

PANEL

Recovering date: %s

If you did not create this account, ignore this message, your email will be removed from our website in the next 48 hours, a thousand apologies.
reset.log: Account recovered correctly from the panel
